{"body": {"name": "Near CLI GUI", "summary": "I propose to create a user-friendly Graphical User Interface (GUI) that wraps around the existing NEAR CLI, making key functions like account management, key handling, token operations, contract management, transaction tracking, and configuration settings more accessible. This tool will simplify NEAR interactions for developers by providing intuitive UI components while running NEAR CLI commands in the background. The result will be an enhanced development experience with a lower learning curve.", "category": "Tooling & Infrastructure", "timeline": {"status": "REVIEW", "sponsor_requested_review": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": false}, "supervisor": null, "description": "This GUI will serve as a frontend layer for the existing NEAR CLI, enabling seamless interaction with NEAR blockchain functionalities without manually typing CLI commands. The underlying NEAR CLI will handle all operations, ensuring full compatibility while presenting users with an intuitive interface. Below is a breakdown of deliverables and budget allocation:\\\\n\\\\n--\\\\n\\\\n**Deliverable 1: Account Management Module**\\\\n\\\\n- **Features:**\\\\n    - User-friendly UI to manage, create, and delete accounts.\\\\n    - Background execution of commands:\\\\n        - `view-account-summary`\\\\n        - `import-account`\\\\n        - `export-account`\\\\n        - `create-account`\\\\n        - `delete-account`\\\\n    - Interactive displays for account details, shown with specialized UI components for readability.\\\\n- **Budget:** $2,000\\\\n\\\\n**Deliverable 2: Keys Management Module**\\\\n\\\\n- **Features:**\\\\n    - Visual tools for managing and viewing account keys.\\\\n    - Background execution of commands:\\\\n        - `list-keys`\\\\n        - `add-key`\\\\n        - `delete-keys`\\\\n    - Secure key management with user alerts and custom UI displays to prevent accidental exposure.\\\\n- **Budget:** $2,000\\\\n\\\\n**Deliverable 3: Token Operations Module**\\\\n\\\\n- **Features:**\\\\n    - Simplified UI for token transactions, including NEAR, FTs, and NFTs.\\\\n    - Background execution of commands:\\\\n        - `send-near`\\\\n        - `send-ft`\\\\n        - `send-nft`\\\\n        - `view-near-balance`\\\\n        - `view-ft-balance`\\\\n        - `view-nft-assets`\\\\n    - Visual balance displays and transaction histories shown in comprehensive UI panels for better readability.\\\\n- **Budget:** $3,000\\\\n\\\\n**Deliverable 4: Contract Management Module**\\\\n\\\\n- **Features:**\\\\n    - User-friendly interface for deploying and interacting with contracts.\\\\n    - Background execution of commands:\\\\n        - `deploy`\\\\n        - `call-function`\\\\n        - `inspect`\\\\n    - Real-time outputs from contract interactions displayed as dedicated UI components for improved comprehension and debugging.\\\\n- **Budget:** $2,000\\\\n\\\\n**Deliverable 5: Transaction Management Module**\\\\n\\\\n- **Features:**\\\\n    - Visual transaction builder and tracker.\\\\n    - Background execution of commands:\\\\n        - `view-status`\\\\n    - Real-time transaction tracking with outputs shown in specialized components that highlight statuses and logs for easier troubleshooting.\\\\n- **Budget:** $2,000\\\\n\\\\n**Deliverable 6: Configuration Management Module, Ability to Install NEAR CLI**\\\\n\\\\n- **Features:**\\\\n    - UI components for managing connection settings and configurations.\\\\n    - Background execution of commands:\\\\n        - `show-connections`\\\\n        - `edit-connection`\\\\n    - Profile switching and network status indicators presented through clear, user-friendly UI elements.\\\\n    - Simplified one-click installation of the NEAR CLI within the app, streamlining the onboarding process for newcomers.\\\\n- **Budget:** $2,000\\\\n\\\\n**Deliverable 7: Additional Small Features**\\\\n\\\\n- **Features:**\\\\n    - Integrated user guides and step-by-step tutorials.\\\\n    - Application logs for reviewing past command executions, shown as easily accessible UI components.\\\\n    - Enhanced error handling with detailed, user-friendly feedback displays.\\\\n- **Budget:** $2,000\\\\n\\\\n**Total Time:** 6 Weeks\\\\n**Total Budget:** $15,000\\\\n\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\n\\\\n**Tolga Yayc\\\\u{131} - Software Engineer**\\\\n\\\\nI will be the sole member of this project, responsible for all the aspects of the proposal\\\\u{2019}s work, from design to implementation. I completed my bachelor\\\\\\'s degree in computer engineering and now working with blockchain protocols. \\\\n\\\\nI have **developed similar developer toolings** for Stellar and Dfinity, and we are currently continuing to develop them by actively exchanging ideas with the teams. Also, I have developed more than 10 projects for 7+ protocols including Solana, Arbitrum, Lens, Aave, Filecoin, Compound, W3F etc so that I have necessary technical skills to develop this kind of application.\\\\n\\\\nSome of my projects that I lastly developed;\\\\n\\\\n- Sora: https://github.com/tolgayayci/sora (More than 850+ downloads, similar functionality to Near CLI GUI)\\\\n- Dfx Dashboard: https://github.com/tolgayayci/dfx-dashboard (Similar functionality to Near CLI GUI)\\\\n- Stellar Suite: https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=tolgayayci.stellar-suite\\\\n- Stylus VS Code Extension (Stylus Suite): https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=tolgayayci.stylussuite\\\\n\\\\nYou can also contact with grant team of some protocols that I worked directly,\\\\n\\\\n- `@jewandidi`- Arbitrum Questbook Dev Tooling Domain Allocator (Telegram)\\\\n- Jason Ibrahim (jason.ibrahim@dfinity.org) - Dfinity Foundation (Email)\\\\n- `@Oxmigi` - Aave (Telegram)", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "3322f73f856641bbeee23400deead5d97d3091f8cf323af83a37579606427868", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "15000", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDT"}, "labels": [], "accepted_terms_and_conditions_version": 132152122}

{"data": {"devhub.near": {"post": {"main": "{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"text\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"We have just received a new *Tooling & Infrastructure* proposal.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**By**: @3322f73f856641bbeee23400deead5d97d3091f8cf323af83a37579606427868\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Title**: \\\\u{201c}Near CLI GUI\\\\u{201c}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Summary**:\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nI propose to create a user-friendly Graphical User Interface (GUI) that wraps around the existing NEAR CLI, making key functions like account management, key handling, token operations, contract management, transaction tracking, and configuration settings more accessible. This tool will simplify NEAR interactions for developers by providing intuitive UI components while running NEAR CLI commands in the background. The result will be an enhanced development experience with a lower learning curve.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nRead the full proposal and share your feedback on [DevHub](/devhub.near/widget/app?page=proposal&id=245)\\\\\\\"}"}, "index": {"post": "{\\\\\\\"key\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"main\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"value\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\"}}"}}}}

{"body": {"name": "UX improvents for Tresury Management System (Oct 2024)", "summary": "Refactored and optimized UI assets for scalability and customization, organized color styles, initiated text style organization, and added dark mode. Conducted a workflow workshop with Ori and Megha, resulting in GitHub board improvements. Discussed Proposal Portal enhancements with the team. Completed tasks: Refresh Data Button (#87), Governance Setting UI (#86), Voting Options Improvement (#79).", "category": "DevDAO Platform", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": "theori.nea", "description": "## **Key Achievements**\\\\n\\\\n#### UI Assets Optimization\\\\n\\\\n- Refactored and optimized UI assets to enhance scalability and customizability for each client.\\\\n- Organized a cohesive\\\\u{a0}**Color Style**\\\\u{a0}system across the entire platform.\\\\n- Began restructuring\\\\u{a0}**Text Styles**\\\\u{a0}for consistent application (work in progress).\\\\n- Implemented\\\\u{a0}**Dark Mode**\\\\u{a0}for improved user accessibility and experience.\\\\n- Prepared project instances for\\\\u{a0}**Devhub, Infinex,**\\\\u{a0}and\\\\u{a0}**Infrastructure Committee**.\\\\n\\\\n#### Workshops & Discussions\\\\n\\\\n- Workshop with Ori and Megha to refine our workflow, making it more structured and predictable. Following this, Ori improved our GitHub board, which has significantly streamlined my workflow.\\\\n- Engaged in several discussions with the team to explore enhancements to the\\\\u{a0}**Proposal Portal**, aiming to maximize its usability and effectiveness.\\\\n\\\\n#### Completed Tasks\\\\n\\\\n- **Add \\\\\\\"Refresh\\\\\\\" Data Button**\\\\u{a0}[#87](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/issues/87)\\\\n- **Governance Setting UI (Threshold & Vote Duration)**\\\\u{a0}[#86](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/issues/86)\\\\n- **Improve Voting Options & Horizontal Scroll**\\\\u{a0}[#79](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/issues/79)\\\\n\\\\n#### **Cost**\\\\n\\\\n- **Rate**: $2,500/month\\\\n- **Total Amount**: $2,500 USD", "linked_proposals": [224], "receiver_account": "freski.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "2500", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDT"}, "labels": [], "accepted_terms_and_conditions_version": 132324006}

{"data": {"devhub.near": {"post": {"main": "{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"text\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"We have just received a new *DevDAO Platform* proposal.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**By**: @freski.near\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Title**: \\\\u{201c}UX improvents for Tresury Management System (Oct 2024)\\\\u{201c}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Summary**:\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nRefactored and optimized UI assets for scalability and customization, organized color styles, initiated text style organization, and added dark mode. Conducted a workflow workshop with Ori and Megha, resulting in GitHub board improvements. Discussed Proposal Portal enhancements with the team. Completed tasks: Refresh Data Button (#87), Governance Setting UI (#86), Voting Options Improvement (#79).\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nRead the full proposal and share your feedback on [DevHub](/devhub.near/widget/app?page=proposal&id=246)\\\\\\\"}"}, "index": {"post": "{\\\\\\\"key\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"main\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"value\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\"}}"}}}}

{"proposal": {"id": 246, "snapshot": {"name": "UX improvents for Tresury Management System (Oct 2024)", "labels": [], "summary": "Refactored and optimized UI assets for scalability and customization, organized color styles, initiated text style organization, and added dark mode. Following this, Ori improved our GitHub board, which has significantly streamlined my workflow.\\\\n- Engaged in several discussions with the team to explore enhancements to the\\\\u{a0}**Proposal Portal**, aiming to maximize its usability and effectiveness.\\\\n\\\\n#### Completed Tasks\\\\n\\\\n- **Add \\\\\\\"Refresh\\\\\\\" Data Button**\\\\u{a0}[#87](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/issues/87)\\\\n- **Governance Setting UI (Threshold & Vote Duration)**\\\\u{a0}[#86](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/issues/86)\\\\n- **Improve Voting Options & Horizontal Scroll**\\\\u{a0}[#79](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/issues/79)\\\\n\\\\n#### **Cost**\\\\n\\\\n- **Rate**: $2,500/month\\\\n- **Total Amount**: $2,500 USD", "linked_proposals": [224], "receiver_account": "freski.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "2500", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDT"}, "author_id": "freski.near", "snapshot_history": [], "social_db_post_block_height": "0"}}
